body.p: You use this tool to reset an administrative or read-only password. You can find this tool in the following locations, depending upon your platform:
This will result in output as follows:

codeblock.codeph: Please enter the new administrative password (or <Enter> for system generated password):

body.p: Enter a password of six characters or more or you can have the system generate one for you. After you enter a password or accept a generated one, the system will prompt you for confirmation:

codeblock.codeph: Running this command will reset administrative password. Do you really want to do it? (yes/no)yes

body.p: Upon success you will see this output:

codeblock.codeph: Resetting administrative password... Password for user Administrator was successfully replaced. New password is Uxye76FJ

body.p: There are a few possible errors from this command:

codeblock.codeph:
{error,<<"The password must be at least six characters.">>}
{error,<<"Failed to reset administrative password. Node is not initialized.">>}

body.p: The first one indicates you have not provided a password of adequate length. The second one indicates that Couchbase Server is not yet configured and running.
